posts.content: hi, Any good camp site's near tatton park for next year's show

Hi, I'm actually currently on a site at the moment called Beech Croft Farm which is between Buxton and Bakewell off the A6 and about 30 miles from Tatton I think.
Current cost is Â£12.50 for the van, awning and 2 adults, electric is on a pay as you go basis. You get a card with credit on it and at the end of your stay what you don't use is refunded.
The site is immaculate and the toilet block is like new.

It's cold and wet at the moment but with free wifi Mrs Reb can watch xfactor while I catch up on the Forum.
Best I know is at The Hollies on the a49 near cuddington, its posh! with a restaurant etc, its bout 8 mile away. Near a gastropub called the cabbage hall and alton park race circuit.
